Name: hepatic veno-occlusive disease
Definition: A hepatic vascular disease that is characterized by obstruction of some of the small veins of the liver.

Name: portal hypertension
Definition: An osteomyelitis that has_material_basis_in infection located_in petrous part of temporal bone.

Name: Budd-Chiari syndrome
Definition: An eating disorder that is characterized by effortless regurgitation of most meals following consumption.

Name: hepatic infarction
Definition: A uterine disease that is characterized by inflammation.

Name: nutmeg liver
Definition: A uterine disease that is characterized by inflammation.

Name: peliosis hepatis
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the stomach.
